means: 又苦又甜的，苦乐参半的

sentence.Network_en: Along the way she tells a poignant, bittersweet story.
sentence.Network_cn: 在找寻过程中她讲述了一个辛酸, 却又苦乐参半的故事.

sentence.Network_en: Darker roasts, in contrast, have a fuller flavor approaching a bittersweet tang.
sentence.Network_cn: 深度烘焙, 比较而言, 苦甜参半的风味更加浓郁.

sentence.Network_en: That looks like a victory forconservation, albeit a bittersweet one.
sentence.Network_cn: 这看似动物保育工作的巨大成就,不过其中却有隐忧.

entry.def: If you describe an experience as bittersweet, you mean that it has some happy aspects and some sad ones.

example.ex: ...bittersweet memories of his first appearance for the team.
example.tran: 他首次代表球队登场亮相时苦乐参半的记忆

entry.def: A bittersweet taste seems bitter and sweet at the same time.

means.word_mean: 1. poisonous perennial Old World vine having violet flowers and oval coral-red berries; widespread weed in North America
2. twining shrub of North America having three-valved yellow capsules enclosing scarlet seeds
2. having a taste that is a mixture of bitterness and sweetness
